categories: Category:Imperial Navy captains of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Engar Ret was a captain in the Imperial Navy. He commanded an Imperial scout base on the moon of Tempay, in orbit of Gacerian, during the early years of the New Republic. Ret coveted the position of Gacerian's Governor, Ulbrek Gostech, and followed his every move in order to report all failures to the Empire.
